a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Annual private investment in artificial intelligence, by focus area
Includes companies that received more than $1.5 million in investment. This data is expressed in US dollars, adjusted
Data source: NetBase Quid via AI Index Report (2023)
Note: Data is expressed in constant 2021 US$. Inflation adjustment is based on the US Consumer Price Index (CPI).
